attributes.action: Regulate the dermal filler / Botox industry.
attributes.additional_details:
Damage / distress to girls and women who are having these procedures done not realising anyone can set up as a therapist and inject potentially harmful substances into peoples faces. 
Clients are being duped by practitioners printing of worthless certificates of fitness to practice then having no duty of care to clients they have damaged. It’s a disgrace that this has not been addressed.
attributes.background:
Regular the entire industry where people are being injected with Botox /dermal fillers by unqualified staff. Make qualification and registration /insurance mandatory Provide users with protection and rights. 
It is the Wild West with anyone able to set up and the potential for harm is huge.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605445
